Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:diffusealpha(0) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,-10,0) jm_house = self end
Layer.TacInCommand: %function(self) self:diffusealpha(1) self:zoomx(0) self:zoomy(2) self:bounceend(0.4) self:zoomx(1) self:zoomy(1) end
Layer.TacOutCommand: %function(self) self:zoomx(1) self:zoomy(1) self:bouncebegin(0.2) self:zoomx(2) self:zoomy(0) end

Layer.TacAttackCommand: %function(self) self:hidden(0) self:setstate(1) self:zoom(1) self:linear(0.2) self:zoom(0.8) jm_tacIdle:hidden(1) jm_tacHurt:hidden(1) end
